name: Ladies Fingers
description: Okra is a nutritious food with many health benefits. It’s rich in magnesium, folate, fiber, antioxidants, and vitamin C, K1, and A. Okra may benefit pregnant women, heart health, and blood sugar control. It may even have anticancer properties. Cooking okra can be simple. Add it to your grocery list to try a new ingredient with powerful health effects. [Source: www.healthline.com] Disclaimer: Please note that the image is used for presentation purposes only.
